13 //define Fickian diffusion parameters
14 #define DcV 0.01
15 
16 //define geometric expression
17 //defining a circle centered at (0.0,0.0) with radius spanX/10
18 #define exp1 (std::sqrt(x*x+y*y)<spanX/10)
19 
20 //define temporal expression
21 #define exp2 (t<timeFinal/4)
22 
23 //define required residuals
24 #define rcV (c + timeStep*subdomain(exp1 && exp2, constV(1.0)) )
25 #define rcxV (constV(-DcV*timeStep)*cx)
